silenceErrors.title: Silence Errors
silenceErrors.description: Don't show an error message if there is a problem formatting your code

useEslint.title: ESlint Integration
useEslint.description:
Use [prettier-eslint](https://github.com/prettier/prettier-eslint) to infer your prettier settings based on your eslint config. If we cannot infer a prettier setting from your eslint config (or if there is no eslint config in the current project), we will fallback to using your settings in the *Prettier Options* section.

**Note:** If you enable *Format on Save*, we recommend disabling ESlint's auto-fix to prevent fixing your code twice.

useEditorConfig.title: EditorConfig Integration
useEditorConfig.description:
Use [EditorConfig](http://editorconfig.org/) configuration to load project-based settings for prettier formatting
Takes precedence over your settings. The following settings will be overriden if they are found in your .editorconfig: **Use tabs**, **Tab width**, **Print width**

enabled.title: Format Files on Save
enabled.description: Automatically format entire file when saving.

respectEslintignore.title: Ignore Files in .eslintignore
respectEslintignore.description: Works regardless of whether ESlint integration is enabled or not.

showInStatusBar.title: Show in Status Bar
showInStatusBar.description: Show in status bar if *Format on Save* is enabled or not.

javascriptScopes.title: JS Scopes
javascriptScopes.description: Use `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

typescriptScopes.title: Typescript Scopes
typescriptScopes.description: Use `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

cssScopes.title: CSS Scopes
cssScopes.description: Use `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

excludedGlobs.title: Exclude (list of globs)
excludedGlobs.description: A list of file globs to exclude from formatting on save (takes precedence over scopes). Use commas to seperate each glob.

whitelistedGlobs.title: Include (list of globs)
whitelistedGlobs.description: A list of file globs to always format on save (takes precedence over scopes and excluded globs). Use commas to seperate each glob. NOTE: If there are globs in this list, files not matching the globs will not be formatted on save regardless of other options.

isDisabledIfNotInPackageJson.title: Only format if prettier is found in your project's dependencies
isDisabledIfNotInPackageJson.description: Does not format on save if prettier (or prettier-eslint/prettier-eslint-cli if using eslint integration) is in your project's package.json (dependencies or devDependencies)

singleQuote.title: Single Quotes
singleQuote.description: Use single instead of double quotes.

bracketSpacing.title: Bracket Spacing
bracketSpacing.description: Print spaces inside of object literals.

semi.title: Semicolons
semi.description: Add semicolons at the end of lines.

jsxBracketSameLine.title: JSX Bracket Same Line
jsxBracketSameLine.description: Put > on the same line in JSX.

printWidth.title: Print Width
printWidth.description: Fit code within this line limit

tabWidth.title: Tab Width
tabWidth.description: Number of spaces to use per tab. Use 'auto' to use your editor's tab width setting.

trailingComma.title: Trailing Comma
trailingComma.description: Controls the printing of trailing commas wherever possible

parser.title: Javascript Parser
parser.description: Choose which [supported parser](https://www.npmjs.com/package/prettier#language-support) to use. (Does not apply to Typescript or CSS)

prettierLast.title: Run Prettier Last
prettierLast.description: Run eslint => prettier (instead of prettier => eslint)
